name: com.github.nufeng1999.chatai
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.debug: changever.cmd && cp -rf res platforms/android/app/src/main/res && cp -r index.html www/ && cordova run android --debug --  --packageType apk
scripts.release: changever.cmd && cp -rf res platforms/android/app/src/main/res && cp -r index.html www/ && cordova build android --release --  --packageType apk

author: Apache Cordova Team
